title: @rito When Are the Rest of Morde's skins getting updated?
body:
You updated the default and Dragon Knight, and they look amazing. 

His other skins however, not so much. You guys did say that you would be updating his other skins. Just wondering when.

replies.body: His Pentakill skin has already been updated along with {{champion:37}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:83}} , and for Lord Morde it doesn't seems as if it really needs one lol.
Infernal and Lord could certainly use the texture updates. Especially infernal.
